name: Acceso y navegación al formulario de registro de plan

testSteps.description: 1: Acceso y navegación al formulario de registro de plan ({userDavox=DavoxUser, passwordDavox=123456, codigoPlan=5013, desciption=Prueba, includedUnits=3000000, fixedCharge=52, LDNMinuteRate=52, LDIMinuteRate=172, LEMinuteRate=172, additionalLdnMinuteValue=52, additionalLdiMinuteValue=52, AdditionalLeMinuteValue=52, altamiraHomologousPlan=G5, altamiraBond=BDMG, successMessage=Se ha ingresado correctamente el registro, nuevasUnidadesIncluidas=4000000, errorMsaje1=Error en actualización, queryPlanVosCorporativa=SELECT * FROM DAVOX.planes_voz_corporativa WHERE COD_PLAN = '5012', QueryHomologacionPlanes=SELECT * FROM DAVOX.homologacion_planes WHERE COD_PLAN = '241'})

children.description: Given I am on the Davox Plus login page
DavoxUser opens the browser at http://10.203.221.252/login

When I login with valid credentials
| user | password |
| DavoxUser | 123456 |
Davoxuser login page task
DavoxUser enters 'rhiguitaqu' into enter the user name
DavoxUser enters 'SqaTel*123456*' into enter the password
DavoxUser clicks on Click on accept button
And I click on the Básicas button and select the Facturación option
Davoxuser to billing task
DavoxUser clicks on click on the basics menu
DavoxUser clicks on Click on billing option
Then I should be redirected to the facturation page
Then Facturación should be an element that is visible
And hago clic en la opción Mantenimiento Plan Voz Corporativa
Davoxuser billing task
DavoxUser clicks on Click on the maintenance vox
Then I should be redirected to the form to register a plan
Then Mantenimiento Planes Voz Corporativa should be an element that is visible

When I comple the form with codigo plan "5013", descripcion "Prueba", unidades incluidas "3000000", cargo fijo "52", valor minuto ldn incluido "52", valor minuto ldi incluido "172", valor minuto le incluido "172", valor minuto ldn adicional "52", valor minuto ldi adicional "52", valor minuto le adicional "52", plan homologo altamira "G5", bono altamira "BDMG" and click on agregar button
Davoxuser corporate voice maintenance plans task
DavoxUser enters '5013' into insert the plan code
DavoxUser enters 'Prueba' into insert the description
DavoxUser clicks on Open menu type of plan
DavoxUser clicks on click on money option
DavoxUser enters '3000000' into insert the unit
DavoxUser enters '52' into insert the Cargo Fijo
DavoxUser enters '52' into insert the description
DavoxUser enters '172' into insert the description
DavoxUser enters '172' into insert the description
DavoxUser enters '52' into insert the description
DavoxUser enters '52' into insert the description
DavoxUser enters '52' into insert the description
DavoxUser enters 'G5' into insert the description
DavoxUser enters 'BDMG' into insert the description
DavoxUser clicks on Click on add plan
Then I can see the message "Se ha ingresado correctamente el registro" and click on the aceptar button
Then el mensaje de envío exitoso should be 'Se ha ingresado correctamente el registro'
DavoxUser clicks on click con accept button
Given I go to the search option
Davoxuser go to search task
DavoxUser clicks on click on search button
When I search for the plan code "5013" and click the Buscar button
Davoxuser search plan task
DavoxUser enters '5013' into insert the plan code
DavoxUser clicks on Click on add plan
And I click on the found plan ID
Davoxuser fill out form to updated
DavoxUser clicks on click on search id
Then the plan information should be loaded in the form
When I update the included units to "4000000"  and I click the Guardar button without changing the start date
Davoxuser update plan with error task
DavoxUser clears field insert the unit
DavoxUser enters '4000000' into insert the unit
DavoxUser clicks on Click on add plan
Then I should see an error message "Error en actualización"
Then Message error: should be 'Error en actualización'
When I update the start date
Davoxuser updated date task
DavoxUser clicks on click on save changed
DavoxUser clicks on Click to open calendar
DavoxUser clicks on click on next month
DavoxUser clicks on set other day in the calendar
DavoxUser clicks on Click on add plan
Then I should see a success message "Se ha ingresado correctamente el registro"
Then Message de registro exitoso: should be 'Se ha ingresado correctamente el registro'

Then I connect to the database and verify the updated plan using the query "SELECT * FROM DAVOX.planes_voz_corporativa WHERE COD_PLAN = '5012'" and check the values for codigo plan "5013", description "Prueba", included units "3000000", fixed charge "52", included minute rates "52", "172", "172", and additional rates "52", "52", "52", homologous plan "G5", and bond "BDMG"
Then validar datos plan voz
Then I connect to the database and verify the Altamira bond using the query "SELECT * FROM DAVOX.homologacion_planes WHERE COD_PLAN = '241'", expecting plan code "G5" and bond "BDMG"

userStory.storyName: The system must support creating and updating Tariff Plans with configurable details such as code, description,
userStory.displayName: The system must support creating and updating Tariff Plans with configurable details such as code, description,
userStory.narrative:
plan type, included units, fixed charge, and minute rates (LDN, LDI, LE), both as included and additional values.
  Each plan must have a validity period (start and end date) and an “Altamira Homologous Plan” code.
  When modifying a plan, the current validity must be closed (fecha_final), and a new one must be created with updated data (fecha_inicial)
  in the davox.planes_voz_corporativo table.

values: Se ha ingresado correctamente el registro

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given I am on the Davox Plus login page
When I login with valid credentials
And I click on the Básicas button and select the Facturación option
Then I should be redirected to the facturation page
And hago clic en la opción Mantenimiento Plan Voz Corporativa
Then I should be redirected to the form to register a plan
When I comple the form with codigo plan "<codigoPlan>", descripcion "<desciption>", unidades incluidas "<includedUnits>", cargo fijo "<fixedCharge>", valor minuto ldn incluido "<LDNMinuteRate>", valor minuto ldi incluido "<LDIMinuteRate>", valor minuto le incluido "<LEMinuteRate>", valor minuto ldn adicional "<additionalLdnMinuteValue>", valor minuto ldi adicional "<additionalLdiMinuteValue>", valor minuto le adicional "<AdditionalLeMinuteValue>", plan homologo altamira "<altamiraHomologousPlan>", bono altamira "<altamiraBond>" and click on agregar button
Then I can see the message "<successMessage>" and click on the aceptar button
Given I go to the search option
When I search for the plan code "<codigoPlan>" and click the Buscar button
And I click on the found plan ID
Then the plan information should be loaded in the form
When I update the included units to "<nuevasUnidadesIncluidas>"  and I click the Guardar button without changing the start date
Then I should see an error message "<errorMsaje1>"
When I update the start date
Then I should see a success message "<successMessage>"
Then I connect to the database and verify the updated plan using the query "<queryPlanVosCorporativa>" and check the values for codigo plan "<codigoPlan>", description "<desciption>", included units "<includedUnits>", fixed charge "<fixedCharge>", included minute rates "<LDNMinuteRate>", "<LDIMinuteRate>", "<LEMinuteRate>", and additional rates "<additionalLdnMinuteValue>", "<additionalLdiMinuteValue>", "<AdditionalLeMinuteValue>", homologous plan "<altamiraHomologousPlan>", and bond "<altamiraBond>"
Then I connect to the database and verify the Altamira bond using the query "<QueryHomologacionPlanes>", expecting plan code "<altamiraHomologousPlan>" and bond "<altamiraBond>"

scenarioOutline:
Given I am on the Davox Plus login page
When I login with valid credentials
|user | password|
|<userDavox> | <passwordDavox>|
And I click on the Básicas button and select the Facturación option
Then I should be redirected to the facturation page
And hago clic en la opción Mantenimiento Plan Voz Corporativa
Then I should be redirected to the form to register a plan
When I comple the form with codigo plan "<codigoPlan>", descripcion "<desciption>", unidades incluidas "<includedUnits>", cargo fijo "<fixedCharge>", valor minuto ldn incluido "<LDNMinuteRate>", valor minuto ldi incluido "<LDIMinuteRate>", valor minuto le incluido "<LEMinuteRate>", valor minuto ldn adicional "<additionalLdnMinuteValue>", valor minuto ldi adicional "<additionalLdiMinuteValue>", valor minuto le adicional "<AdditionalLeMinuteValue>", plan homologo altamira "<altamiraHomologousPlan>", bono altamira "<altamiraBond>" and click on agregar button
Then I can see the message "<successMessage>" and click on the aceptar button
Given I go to the search option
When I search for the plan code "<codigoPlan>" and click the Buscar button
And I click on the found plan ID
Then the plan information should be loaded in the form
When I update the included units to "<nuevasUnidadesIncluidas>"  and I click the Guardar button without changing the start date
Then I should see an error message "<errorMsaje1>"
When I update the start date
Then I should see a success message "<successMessage>"
Then I connect to the database and verify the updated plan using the query "<queryPlanVosCorporativa>" and check the values for codigo plan "<codigoPlan>", description "<desciption>", included units "<includedUnits>", fixed charge "<fixedCharge>", included minute rates "<LDNMinuteRate>", "<LDIMinuteRate>", "<LEMinuteRate>", and additional rates "<additionalLdnMinuteValue>", "<additionalLdiMinuteValue>", "<AdditionalLeMinuteValue>", homologous plan "<altamiraHomologousPlan>", and bond "<altamiraBond>"
Then I connect to the database and verify the Altamira bond using the query "<QueryHomologacionPlanes>", expecting plan code "<altamiraHomologousPlan>" and bond "<altamiraBond>"
